Urho3D::ObjectAnimation Class Reference

Object animation class, an object animation include one or more attribute animations and theirs wrap mode and speed for an Animatable object. More...

#include <ObjectAnimation.h>

Detailed Description

Object animation class, an object animation include one or more attribute animations and theirs wrap mode and speed for an Animatable object.
